name: 卡萝莉娜·洛迪嘉

introduction: Karolina Lodyga trained as an actor's training at the Berlin School of Performing Arts and the transform acting school in Berlin. This was followed by several theater engagements since 2004. At the Teatr Studio in Warsaw, she played several roles in plays by Tadeusz Różewicz, Stanislaw Ignacy Witkiewicz and comes in Don Juan from the war of Odon von Horvath. At the Palace Theater Celle she played the lead role in a 2007 stage version of Alice in Wonderland, based on the novel by the English author Lewis Carroll. In 2008 she appeared at the Dresden Comedy Theatre as Brooke in The Rat Race by Michael Frayn.Awareness Lodyga Karolina became known for her starring role in the soap opera as Katya Polauke Anna and love. She played the scheming half-sister of the female lead Anna. After 361 episodes increased Lodyga from the series. She then played and directed by Dominik Graf in the award-winning television series In the face of crime. 2010 turned Lodyga a consequence of the ZDF series Coast Guard, which was broadcast in early 2011 on ZDF. In January 2011, turned Lodyga an episode of the detective. From March 2011 to June 2011 she was again seen in the role of Katja Polauke in the Sat.1 telenovela and Anna's love. Of 28 October 2011 to 29th November she was again seen in this role.In 2009 she took four more cast members Anna and the love of the Sat.1 show Yes, we can dance part. In addition, also on the cable one-action show Fort Boyard.
